text:
#ThankYou HPM #SheikhHasina for arranging #CovidVaccine for #Bangladeshis in the shortest time. 
We are lucky to get the #vaccine shots in early #February under good management where most of the countries are still suffering to ensure #VaccineForAll. 
#Bangladesh #Covid19 🇧🇩 ✌️ https://t.co/bDEoKSdwzE
